import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReportButton(){const[key,setKey]=useState([]);const[value,setValue]=useState([]);const[filterKey,setFilterKey]=useState("");const[filteredData,setFilteredData]=useState([]);const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/report-page");setKey(Object.keys(response.data[0]));//FOR COLON
const valueArray=[];//TODO OK VALULERİ EKLYOR ARRAY'E
for(let i=0;i<Object.values(response.data).length;i++){valueArray.push(Object.values(response.data[i]));}setValue(valueArray);//FOR ROW
}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data",error);}};const handleFilterKeyChange=event=>{setFilterKey(event.target.value);};const applyFilter=()=>{if(!filterKey){// Filtre anahtarı boşsa, filtrelenmiş veri olarak tüm veriyi göster
setFilteredData(value);}else{// Filtre anahtarı doluysa, veri setinde dolaşarak filtreleme yap
const filtered=value.filter(row=>row.hasOwnProperty(filterKey));setFilteredData(filtered);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchData,className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded mr-2",children:"Veriyi Getir"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filtreleme anahtar\u0131 girin",value:filterKey,onChange:handleFilterKeyChange,className:"mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:applyFilter,className:"bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Filtrele"}),key.length>0&&(filteredData.length>0?filteredData:value).length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table-auto mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:key.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-800",children:item},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:(filteredData.length>0?filteredData:value).map((innerArray,outerIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:innerArray.map((item,innerIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:item},innerIndex))},outerIndex))})]})]});}export default ReportButton;// TODO USE EFFECT VE AXİOS İLE BİLGİLERİ GETİR ORADAN DA ONLARI GRİDLE TABLO ŞEKLİNDE BUTONU CLİCKLEDİĞİNDE
//TODO burada useState ile  aldığımız verileri  use effect içerisinde deStructere edelim key ve valuediye
